title: Alright, let's be honest here guys, how many of you actually believe Katarina is balanced
body: I honestly don't get where the "counterplay" is. CCing her isn't counterplay, it's a rule of thumb when playing against Katarina. But that still doesn't stop her from Shunpoing onto your back line and deleting carries. I'm sick of reserving a ban slot for her in every. Single. Game.
